title: Sum of Two Numbers
description: Given two integers a and b, return their sum.
input: Two integers a and b (−10^9 ≤ a, b ≤ 10^9)
output: A single integer — the sum of a and b.

title: Count the Digits
description: Given an integer n, count how many digits it has.
output: An integer representing the number of digits in n.

title: Is Prime?
description: Determine whether a given number n is a prime number.
output: Print 'YES' if n is prime, otherwise print 'NO'.
